text: The 2015 Vietnamese National Football Second League was the 17th season of the Vietnamese National Football Second League ==Team changes== The following teams have changed division since the 2014 season. ===To Vietnamese Second League=== Promoted from Vietnamese Third Division * Mancons Sài Gòn * Bình Định Relegated from V.League 2 * XM Fico Tây Ninh ===From Vietnamese Second League=== Relegated to Vietnamese Third Division * none Promoted to V.League 2 * Nam Định * Phú Yên * Bình Phước * Công An Nhân Dân ==League stage== ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ==Final stage== ===Semi-finals=== ===Play-off=== ==References== ==External links== *Official Page 2 2015
title: 2015 Vietnamese National Football Second League
